QuestData.Title: Dirty Birds
QuestData.Description: The sky above the Shriveled Oasis is littered with these nasty vultures.$b$bLike infectious rodents with wings, these creatures serve no great purpose and inflict untold misery.$b$bRid the skies of this nuisance and leave the region better than you found it.
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to slay 8 Diseased Vultures.
QuestData.RewardText: You've made the Cradle of the Ancients a somewhat less despicable place to travel through.
